summary: Adds Sartan Chief of the Half Giants as a companion. Can be obtained by going tot he visible (but not yet activated) Map marker near Ivarstead.
descriptionHtml:
Adds Sartan Chief of the Half Giants as a companion. Can be obtained by going tot he visible (but not yet activated) Map marker near Ivarstead. 

Have not yet worked out how to remove orc lore based dialogue from his dialogue set however That shall be something I will be looking into for the primary mod. This aswell as the Playable race mod are more or less teasers of what is yet to come.

There are no bugs that I have found yet. 

I shall not be working on this mod furthur unless a bug is found.
author: VilniusNastavnik
